data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Kapisa who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kapisa, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Kapisa who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Kapisa, Afghanistan.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Kapisa unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Kapisa to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Baloch, Western people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Kapisa, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 78 believers in Kapisa, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kapisa, Afghanistan has a population of 488,300.

We estimate Kapisa has 78 people who might know Jesus, 15 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 488,207 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,260 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Kapisa, Afghanistan to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.
